title: Stage S20
description: Level 1 grammar practice focusing on stage-specific patterns and expressions.
examples: First, we will plan the project. Then, we will execute it.
Finally, we will review the results and make improvements.
learning_points: Level 1 target grammar and expressions with practical usage examples

sentences.kr: 먼저 프로젝트를 계획할 거예요. 그다음에 실행할 거예요.
sentences.en: First, we will plan the project. Then, we will execute it.
Finally, we will review the results and make improvements.

sentences.kr: 우리가 늦었어요. 따라서 영화 시작 부분을 놓쳤어요.
sentences.en: We were late. Therefore, we missed the beginning of the movie.
In conclusion, this project has been very successful.

sentences.kr: 비가 많이 왔어요. 그 결과 경기가 취소되었어요.
sentences.en: It rained heavily. As a result, the match was canceled.
To begin with, let me explain the basic concept.
Next, we need to consider the budget.

sentences.kr: 요약하자면, 더 많은 시간과 자원이 필요해요.
sentences.en: In summary, we need more time and resources.
Consequently, we decided to postpone the meeting.
To sum up, it was an excellent presentation.

sentences.kr: 먼저 프로젝트를 계획할 거예요. 그다음에 실행할 거예요.
sentences.en: First, we will plan the project. Then, we will execute it.
Finally, we will review the results and make improvements.

sentences.kr: 우리가 늦었어요. 따라서 영화 시작 부분을 놓쳤어요.
sentences.en: We were late. Therefore, we missed the beginning of the movie.
In conclusion, this project has been very successful.

sentences.kr: 비가 많이 왔어요. 그 결과 경기가 취소되었어요.
sentences.en: It rained heavily. As a result, the match was canceled.
To begin with, let me explain the basic concept.
Next, we need to consider the budget.

sentences.kr: 요약하자면, 더 많은 시간과 자원이 필요해요.
sentences.en: In summary, we need more time and resources.
Consequently, we decided to postpone the meeting.
To sum up, it was an excellent presentation.
